instructors.name: Tim Campbell
instructors.title: Head Instructor/Owner, CFI
instructors.description: With over **40 years of aviation experience**, Tim is a passionate instructor dedicated to helping his students thrive. Known as **"the best dead stick pilot around,"** his expertise and calm demeanor make him an invaluable mentor. Whether you're just starting or advancing your training, Tim's knowledge and hands-on approach will set you up for success in the skies.

instructors.name: Alex Hoff
instructors.title: Instructor, CFII
instructors.description: Alex is our newest instructor, blending a strong background in **sales, customer service, and motorsports.** With four years of flight experience and ten years as a race car team mechanic and pit crewman, Alex brings **energy, skill, and passion** to every lesson, making him a standout instructor.

instructors.name: Liam Foley
instructors.title: Instructor, CFII
instructors.description: A **Purdue University aviation graduate**, Liam is passionate about flying and dedicated to giving back to the aviation community. With a **wealth of knowledge** and a **contagious enthusiasm for learning**, he creates an engaging and supportive environment for his students, making every lesson both educational and inspiring.

instructors.name: Nate Fanara
instructors.title: Instructor, CFII/MEI
instructors.description: Bringing a wealth of experience and a strong background from his service in the USMC, Nate's **discipline and determination** set him apart. His ability to adapt to different learning styles ensures that every student receives personalized, effective instruction. Recently earning his private pilot helicopter license and holding a Multi-Engine Instructor (MEI) certification, Nate combines his dedication and expertise to provide top-notch training.

instructors.name: Sam Gregson
instructors.title: Instructor, CFII
instructors.description:
Sam brings a strong aviation background, holding a degree in Aviation Operations and Management from Southern New Hampshire University. His blend of **technical expertise and industry knowledge** helps students develop both skill and confidence in the cockpit.

With a **patient teaching style** and a passion for flight, Sam is committed to guiding pilots at all levels toward their aviation goals.

instructors.name: Nathan Underwood
instructors.title: Instructor, CFII
instructors.description: Nathan Underwood is a **homegrown pilot** who completed his training through **United Aviate Academy**. He is fluent in **Spanish** and a graduate of **UNH** with both undergraduate and **master's** **degrees**. Nathan brings **professionalism** and **passion** to flight instruction and is **eager to mentor** the next generation of aviators.
